keyword: how many calories in ny strip steak
title: How Many Calories in NY Strip Steak?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in NY strip steak (8 oz serving), plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, fat, carbs, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in NY Strip Steak?
assumptions: 8 oz (227 g) portion, cooked (grilled), USDA choice grade, separable lean and fat, trimmed to 1/8" fat, no added seasonings or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade, cooking method, fat trimming, and portion size. Check labels or use a food scale for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One 8 oz grilled NY strip steak provides ~568 kcal and ~57 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Fully trimmed of visible fat (lean only)
Pan-seared with 1 tsp oil per steak

faqs.q: How many calories in one NY strip steak?
faqs.a: About 568 kcal for an 8 oz grilled portion with lean and fat.

faqs.q: What's the protein in NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Roughly 57 g protein per 8 oz steak, making it a high-protein choice.

faqs.q: Does NY strip steak have carbs?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugarsâ€”it's nearly all protein and fat.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Grilling retains moisture; frying adds calories from oil. Raw is lower but not typically consumed.

faqs.q: Is NY strip steak high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~39 g total fat per 8 oz, including 16 g saturated; trim fat to reduce.
